sisyphus.comment: Gemini 3 Pro: 48.4 intel, 46.5 coding, 124 tok/s - Best balance for orchestration

oracle.comment: Claude Opus 4.5 Reasoning via Antigravity: 49.7 intel, 47.8 coding - Top reasoning model

librarian.comment: Gemini 3 Flash: Fast research (188 tok/s), good intelligence (46.4)

explore.comment: Free fast exploration - GLM-4.7 is solid for contextual grep tasks

prometheus.comment: Gemini 3 Pro: Strong planning capabilities, good balance

metis.comment: Gemini 3 Pro: Pre-planning analysis requires strong intelligence

momus.comment: Gemini 3 Pro: Plan review needs solid reasoning

visual-engineering.comment: Gemini 3 Pro excellent for UI/UX, frontend work

ultrabrain.comment: Claude Opus 4.5 Reasoning: Top tier for deep logical reasoning

artistry.comment: Gemini 3 Pro: Creative tasks benefit from high-creativity models

quick.comment: Free and fast - perfect for trivial tasks

unspecified-low.comment: GLM 4.7 Thinking: 42.0 intel - Strong free model for general tasks

unspecified-high.comment: Gemini 3 Flash: Fast but capable for unspecified high-priority work

writing.comment: Gemini 3 Flash: Fast, good for documentation and prose

background_task._comment: Rate limits configured for Google/Antigravity models to prevent 429 errors

antigravity._comment: Antigravity AI (free preview): Models have generous weekly quotas with 5-hour refresh cycle. Pro/Ultra subscribers have higher rate limits with priority access.
